heading: Where will the event be held?
content: The event will be held at the Sydney Showground at Sydney Olympic Park.

heading: When will the event be held?
content: The event will be held on the 26-27th November 2022.

heading: Will our authors be there?
content: Publishing companies and bookstores are encouraged to bring a selection of their authors to the event. We don't mind if they're well-known authors or new ones. The idea of the event is to introduce readers to new Australian authors, not just the well-known ones.

heading: Will international authors be flown out?
content: No. Any international authors will be present via video conference only.

heading: Will interstate authors be flown out?
content: Due to budget constraints, it is unlikely that interstate authors will be flown out this year unless they are very high profile and would draw in large crowds.

heading: Will there be a speaker's fee for authors?
content: We hope that most authors will volunteer their time for the opportunity to meet their fans. There is the possibility that speaker's fees may be offered to high profile authors, however, this would need to be negotiated with the Director and Founder of Book Fair Australia.
